match.title: 1st ODI
match.statusText: West Indies won by 1 wicket (with 0 balls remaining)

dismissalText.commentary: Chamara Kapugedera lbw b Edwards 95 (117b 7x4 3x6) SR: 81.19

dismissalComment.html: he falls for 95! Edwards dishes out an inswinging yorker, Kapugedera gets across his stumps and tries to paddle that one wide of short fine leg but the ball strikes him on the boot, Umpire Duncan is convinced

dismissalText.commentary: Chamara Silva c Gayle b Bravo 67 (96b 7x4 0x6) SR: 69.79

dismissalComment.html: Bravo gets the breakthrough, Silva makes room and tries to carve this one over midwicket but can't beat Gayle

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: pitches outside off and moves away, Tharanga stays rooted to the crease and goes for the drive through the covers, he only manages a thick inside edge which shaves his offstump

the top order capitulates....Bravo pitches it up outside off, Jayawardene gets down and goes for the square drive, he ends up playing it straight to Chanderpaul. Sangakkara too fell to in identical manner, both failed to get the elevation to clear the infield

pitches it on a good length on off and gets it to move away a little, Dilshan pokes forward but fails to cover the line as the ball clips the outside edge and carries through to Browne. Bravo set him up the previous delivery with a jaffa and he was rewarded

dismissalComment.html: look at that stump roll.... Edwards lets out a screeching yorker on off stump and gets it to move away late, Udawatte is beaten for pace and movement and is too late in getting his bat down and he looks back to see his offstump go for a toss

dismissalText.commentary: Mahela Udawatte b Edwards 0 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: look at that stump roll.... Edwards lets out a screeching yorker on off stump and gets it to move away late, Udawatte is beaten for pace and movement and is too late in getting his bat down and he looks back to see his offstump go for a toss

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Kumar Sangakkara c Bravo b Taylor 23 (24b 4x4 0x6) SR: 95.83

dismissalComment.html: tame dismissal and Sangakkara's ordinary tour continues, Taylor pitches it up outside off and invites the drive, Sangakkara shapes to scoop it over backward point but doesn't get the desired elevation, Bravo takes it comfortably at waist height. Replays showed Taylor bowling from a yard behind the popping crease

dismissalText.commentary: Chris Gayle lbw b Mendis 52 (81b 8x4 1x6) SR: 64.19

dismissalComment.html: that's his debut wicket....Pitches in line with legstump from over the wicket, it comes on straight and Gayle pokes forward to defend, he's hit in line with the stumps and Taufel is convinced

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: that's his debut wicket....Pitches in line with legstump from over the wicket, it comes on straight and Gayle pokes forward to defend, he's hit in line with the stumps and Taufel is convinced
the flipper! Sammy is totally squared up at the crease as the ball lands on offstump and skids through and whips the top of offstump. Mendis is quite a revelation already
Rush of blood....  Mendis dishes out another legbreak, Taylor stays at the crease and tries to repeat the slog which fetched him the six but he lands it down Silva's throat at long-on

headshotImage.caption: Devon Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Devon Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: pitches fractionally outside the line of legstump, Smith shapes to flick it to the on side but the ball skids through and traps him on the pad, umpire Duncan is convinced

headshotImage.caption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: the bowling change works! Kulasekara pitches it fractionally outside the line off offstump and gets it to move away, Sarwan tamely tries to steer that towards third man but gets a thick edge to Sangakkara. His foot movement was minimal

Sri Lanka claw back quickly.... Kulasekara pitches that outside the line of offstump and gets it to seam back inwards after pitching, Samuels gets across his stumps but is very lazy on the stroke, the ball skids through and hits him in line of middle and leg, umpire Duncan raises the finger

Kulasekara pitches that outside the line of offstump and gets it to seam back inwards after pitching, Samuels gets across his stumps but is very lazy on the stroke, the ball skids through and hits him in line of middle and leg, umpire Duncan raises the finger

dismissalText.commentary: Dwayne Bravo run out (Jayawardene/Sangakkara/Dilshan) 36 (37b 3x4 2x6) SR: 97.29

dismissalComment.html: terrible mixup.... Dilshan delivers from round the wicket, Chanderpaul works it against the turn to short fine-leg, Bravo eyes a single and charges down the track, Chanderpaul was looking at Jayawardene who fired in the throw to the keeper, Sangakkara fired the throw to the bowler but by then, both batsmen were at the same end

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Patrick Browne c Mendis b Dilshan 15 (17b 0x4 1x6) SR: 88.23

dismissalComment.html: Flighted on middle and leg, Browne tries to go downtown again and this time he fails to clear the fielder, Mendis at long-on runs to his left and catches it

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Daren Sammy b Mendis 1 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: the flipper! Sammy is totally squared up at the crease as the ball lands on offstump and skids through and whips the top of offstump. Mendis is quite a revelation already

dismissalText.commentary: Jerome Taylor c Silva b Mendis 9 (6b 0x4 1x6) SR: 150

dismissalComment.html: Rush of blood....  Mendis dishes out another legbreak, Taylor stays at the crease and tries to repeat the slog which fetched him the six but he lands it down Silva's throat at long-on

dismissalText.commentary: Sulieman Benn run out (Jayawardene) 0 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Benn's nightmare ends, the ball is full on off stump, Benn finally connects, he swings across the line and Jayawardene at midwicket has a shy at the stumps and hits, Taufel doesn't bother to call for the replay

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021

batsmen.shot: off side drive on front foot

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentPreTextItems.html: can he seal it with a six!

commentTextItems.html: This is the stuff of dreams! Off all times Vaas has to bowl a full toss! Chanderpaul waits for the gift, clubs that across the line and the ball just goes sailing over Jayawardene at deep midwicket. He waits and waits for the ball to clear the rope, a rather long and agonising one, he breaks out in celebration and the entire troupe from the dressing room rush onto the field and crowd around him. We can just imagine the scenes at Unity Village in Guyana, Chanderpaul's home

commentPostTextItems.html: Folks this has been a sensational match. Chanderpaul proved just what a difference an ice cool head does in these situations. Those who threw their wickets away today can take a lesson or two from him.

While the rest catch their breath let's recap this thriller. Sri Lanka fought back bravely after being reduced to 49 for 5, thanks to a stand of 159 between the Chamaras - Silva and Kapugedera. The target of 236 was always going to be competitive and West Indies did well to start off before they ran into Ajantha Mendis. Mendis mixed it up cleverly and plucked out three wicket.  Bravo and Chanderpaul eased the nerves after Sri Lanka delayed the 3rd Powerplay and after another jolt, it was over to Chanderpaul to steer them through.
That full toss was very similar to the one Chetan Sharma dished out to Javed Miandad in Sharjah in 1986. Brendan Taylor of Zimbabwe carted Mashrafe Mortaza in 2006, the most recent instance.
The Man of the Match is a surprise - it's not Chanderpaul, Kapugedera or Silva. It's Bravo for his 4 for 32 and crucial 36. Larry Gomes was the adjudicator.

This thriller will take time to sink in for all of you. I'll leave you here. Saturday;s game at the same venue is sold out. I thoroughly enjoyed bringing this game to you. On behalf of Raju, our scorer, this is Kanishkaa signing off.

headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Fidel Edwards player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.longCaption: Chaminda Vaas player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentPreTextItems.html: 10 from 2, a six and a four would do it, Vaas pulls back at the time of delivery

commentTextItems.html: well well! Vaas over pitches outside off, the field is close and he creams that past mid-off

commentPreTextItems.html: 11 off 3. What can Edwards do now?

commentTextItems.html: Low full toss, he goes on the walk and clubs it across the line past the diving midwicket

commentPreTextItems.html: 12 off 4. Vaas wouldn't want to overstep at this stage! Men at the edge of the circle

commentTextItems.html: dishes out a low full toss, he makes room and places it to long-on,the throw is sharp
full outside off and he gets the single this time, beats the gap between point and cover

commentPreTextItems.html: Edwards has the strike. Vaas to bowl the final over. Edwards will look for the single, 13 off 6. This is not over yet

commentTextItems.html: Nope, no single, he bowls a low full toss and Edwards can only slice it to short cover
Chanderpaul swings and he connects well, good enough ton beat mid-off and the ball races away

dismissalText.commentary: Sulieman Benn run out (Jayawardene) 0 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

commentTextItems.html: Benn's nightmare ends, the ball is full on off stump, Benn finally connects, he swings across the line and Jayawardene at midwicket has a shy at the stumps and hits, Taufel doesn't bother to call for the replay
another yorker length outside off, he goes for another slog and he misses
makes room and charges down the track, the ball is full and Benn is all at sea as he misses again
beaten again, he's cramped for room outside off, he goes on the walk and he struggles to connect
Benn tries to cut but he's cramped for room and he misses

dismissalText.commentary: Jerome Taylor c Silva b Mendis 9 (6b 0x4 1x6) SR: 150

commentTextItems.html: Rush of blood....  Mendis dishes out another legbreak, Taylor stays at the crease and tries to repeat the slog which fetched him the six but he lands it down Silva's throat at long-on

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: Bang! Taylor stays at the crease, waits for the legbreak and slog sweeps him high over long-on
he lunges forward and pushes it wide of cover
clipped away to the deep wide of deep midwicket, they scamper through for the secondd run

commentPreTextItems.html: Will Taylor give him the charge? Staying back at the crease is a risky proposition

commentTextItems.html: nope, he stays back, waits for the legbreak and tucks it wide of square leg

commentPreTextItems.html: Nervous moments here. 28 off 18. Chanderpaul looks ice cool as always.

commentTextItems.html: he takes a few paces down the track and tucks it softly wide of the bowler
another low full toss, he slams it through the line to long-off and keeps the strike

dismissalComment.html: look at that stump roll.... Edwards lets out a screeching yorker on off stump and gets it to move away late, Udawatte is beaten for pace and movement and is too late in getting his bat down and he looks back to see his offstump go for a toss

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: he falls for 95! Edwards dishes out an inswinging yorker, Kapugedera gets across his stumps and tries to paddle that one wide of short fine leg but the ball strikes him on the boot, Umpire Duncan is convinced

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: pitches outside off and moves away, Tharanga stays rooted to the crease and goes for the drive through the covers, he only manages a thick inside edge which shaves his offstump

the top order capitulates....Bravo pitches it up outside off, Jayawardene gets down and goes for the square drive, he ends up playing it straight to Chanderpaul. Sangakkara too fell to in identical manner, both failed to get the elevation to clear the infield

pitches it on a good length on off and gets it to move away a little, Dilshan pokes forward but fails to cover the line as the ball clips the outside edge and carries through to Browne. Bravo set him up the previous delivery with a jaffa and he was rewarded

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: Bravo gets the breakthrough, Silva makes room and tries to carve this one over midwicket but can't beat Gayle

headshotImage.caption: Fidel Edwards player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Fidel Edwards player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mahela Udawatte b Edwards 0 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: look at that stump roll.... Edwards lets out a screeching yorker on off stump and gets it to move away late, Udawatte is beaten for pace and movement and is too late in getting his bat down and he looks back to see his offstump go for a toss

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Kumar Sangakkara c Bravo b Taylor 23 (24b 4x4 0x6) SR: 95.83

dismissalComment.html: tame dismissal and Sangakkara's ordinary tour continues, Taylor pitches it up outside off and invites the drive, Sangakkara shapes to scoop it over backward point but doesn't get the desired elevation, Bravo takes it comfortably at waist height. Replays showed Taylor bowling from a yard behind the popping crease

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Upul Tharanga b Bravo 10 (31b 1x4 0x6) SR: 32.25

dismissalComment.html: pitches outside off and moves away, Tharanga stays rooted to the crease and goes for the drive through the covers, he only manages a thick inside edge which shaves his offstump

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Mahela Jayawardene c Chanderpaul b Bravo 1 (8b 0x4 0x6) SR: 12.5

dismissalComment.html: the top order capitulates....Bravo pitches it up outside off, Jayawardene gets down and goes for the square drive, he ends up playing it straight to Chanderpaul. Sangakkara too fell to in identical manner, both failed to get the elevation to clear the infield

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Tillakaratne Dilshan c Browne b Bravo 2 (9b 0x4 0x6) SR: 22.22

dismissalComment.html: pitches it on a good length on off and gets it to move away a little, Dilshan pokes forward but fails to cover the line as the ball clips the outside edge and carries through to Browne. Bravo set him up the previous delivery with a jaffa and he was rewarded

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Chamara Silva c Gayle b Bravo 67 (96b 7x4 0x6) SR: 69.79

dismissalComment.html: Bravo gets the breakthrough, Silva makes room and tries to carve this one over midwicket but can't beat Gayle

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Fidel Edwards player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Fidel Edwards player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Chamara Kapugedera lbw b Edwards 95 (117b 7x4 3x6) SR: 81.19

dismissalComment.html: he falls for 95! Edwards dishes out an inswinging yorker, Kapugedera gets across his stumps and tries to paddle that one wide of short fine leg but the ball strikes him on the boot, Umpire Duncan is convinced

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Chris Gayle lbw b Mendis 52 (81b 8x4 1x6) SR: 64.19

dismissalComment.html: that's his debut wicket....Pitches in line with legstump from over the wicket, it comes on straight and Gayle pokes forward to defend, he's hit in line with the stumps and Taufel is convinced

headshotImage.caption: Devon Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Devon Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Devon Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Devon Smith player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Devon Smith lbw b Kulasekara 14 (31b 1x4 0x6) SR: 45.16

dismissalComment.html: pitches fractionally outside the line of legstump, Smith shapes to flick it to the on side but the ball skids through and traps him on the pad, umpire Duncan is convinced

headshotImage.caption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Ramnaresh Sarwan c Sangakkara b Kulasekara 35 (54b 4x4 0x6) SR: 64.81

dismissalComment.html: the bowling change works! Kulasekara pitches it fractionally outside the line off offstump and gets it to move away, Sarwan tamely tries to steer that towards third man but gets a thick edge to Sangakkara. His foot movement was minimal

dismissalText.commentary: Marlon Samuels lbw b Kulasekara 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Sri Lanka claw back quickly.... Kulasekara pitches that outside the line of offstump and gets it to seam back inwards after pitching, Samuels gets across his stumps but is very lazy on the stroke, the ball skids through and hits him in line of middle and leg, umpire Duncan raises the finger

headshotImage.caption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Shivnarine Chanderpaul not out 62 (63b 5x4 1x6) SR: 98.41

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Dwayne Bravo player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Dwayne Bravo run out (Jayawardene/Sangakkara/Dilshan) 36 (37b 3x4 2x6) SR: 97.29

dismissalComment.html: terrible mixup.... Dilshan delivers from round the wicket, Chanderpaul works it against the turn to short fine-leg, Bravo eyes a single and charges down the track, Chanderpaul was looking at Jayawardene who fired in the throw to the keeper, Sangakkara fired the throw to the bowler but by then, both batsmen were at the same end

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Patrick Browne c Mendis b Dilshan 15 (17b 0x4 1x6) SR: 88.23

dismissalComment.html: Flighted on middle and leg, Browne tries to go downtown again and this time he fails to clear the fielder, Mendis at long-on runs to his left and catches it

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Daren Sammy b Mendis 1 (2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50

dismissalComment.html: the flipper! Sammy is totally squared up at the crease as the ball lands on offstump and skids through and whips the top of offstump. Mendis is quite a revelation already

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Silva player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Jerome Taylor c Silva b Mendis 9 (6b 0x4 1x6) SR: 150

dismissalComment.html: Rush of blood....  Mendis dishes out another legbreak, Taylor stays at the crease and tries to repeat the slog which fetched him the six but he lands it down Silva's throat at long-on

dismissalText.commentary: Sulieman Benn run out (Jayawardene) 0 (5b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0

dismissalComment.html: Benn's nightmare ends, the ball is full on off stump, Benn finally connects, he swings across the line and Jayawardene at midwicket has a shy at the stumps and hits, Taufel doesn't bother to call for the replay

notes: Sri Lanka innings
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
Drinks: Sri Lanka - 41/4 in 12.3 overs (LPC Silva 1)
Power Play 3: Overs 15.1 - 20.0
Sri Lanka: 50 runs in 15.3 overs (99 balls), Extras 6
6th Wicket: 50 runs in 87 balls (LPC Silva 13, CK Kapugedera 29, Ex 8)
Sri Lanka: 100 runs in 29.3 overs (185 balls), Extras 15
Drinks: Sri Lanka - 111/5 in 33.0 overs (LPC Silva 26, CK Kapugedera 34)
CK Kapugedera: 50 off 81 balls (5 x 4)
6th Wicket: 100 runs in 148 balls (LPC Silva 37, CK Kapugedera 50, Ex 13)
Sri Lanka: 150 runs in 39.2 overs (244 balls), Extras 19
LPC Silva: 50 off 81 balls (5 x 4)
Sri Lanka: 200 runs in 45.2 overs (282 balls), Extras 24
6th Wicket: 150 runs in 187 balls (LPC Silva 60, CK Kapugedera 73, Ex 18)
Innings Break: Sri Lanka - 235/7 in 50.0 overs (WPUJC Vaas 10, KMDN Kulasekara 1)
West Indies innings
Wet Ground: West Indies - 0/0
Power Play 2: Overs 10.1 - 15.0
West Indies: 50 runs in 11.6 overs (73 balls), Extras 1
1st Wicket: 50 runs in 73 balls (CH Gayle 37, DS Smith 12, Ex 1)
Drinks: West Indies - 66/1 in 17.0 overs (CH Gayle 43, RR Sarwan 7)
CH Gayle: 50 off 76 balls (8 x 4, 1 x 6)
West Indies: 100 runs in 25.2 overs (156 balls), Extras 7
2nd Wicket: 50 runs in 75 balls (CH Gayle 13, RR Sarwan 32, Ex 6)
Power Play 3: Overs 27.1 - 32.0
West Indies: 150 runs in 33.3 overs (207 balls), Extras 9
Drinks: West Indies - 150/4 in 34.0 overs (S Chanderpaul 17, DJ Bravo 23)
5th Wicket: 50 runs in 47 balls (S Chanderpaul 18, DJ Bravo 31, Ex 1)
West Indies: 200 runs in 44.3 overs (274 balls), Extras 10
S Chanderpaul: 50 off 60 balls (4 x 4)

milestones.description: Chamara Silva and Kapugedera's 159-run partnership is SL's highest for the 6th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 133 between Atapattu and Russel Arnold

stories.title: Mystery spinner
stories.subTitle: Ajantha Mendis
stories.summary: Sri Lanka's new tweaker has made everyone sit up and take notice

stories.title: Operational gaffes cloud lofty vision
stories.subTitle: The West Indies board's efforts to regain lost ground
stories.summary: Repeated bunglings by WICB officials have embarrassed West Indies cricket

stories.title: We need to make a plan against Mendis: Bravo
stories.subTitle: Sri Lanka in West Indies 2007-08
stories.seoTitle: We need to make a plan against Mendis: Bravo
stories.summary: Ajantha Mendis' maiden one-day international performance has come in for praise from both the Sri Lankan and West Indian camps

stories.title: 'I was looking for anything' - Chanderpaul
stories.subTitle: West Indies v Sri Lanka, 1st ODI, Trinidad
stories.summary: Shivnarine Chanderpaul credits a little bit of bit of divine intervention and some brute force for his last-ball six which won West Indies the first ODI at Queen's Park Oval

stories.title: Room for improvement - Bravo
stories.subTitle: West Indies v Sri Lanka, 1st ODI, Trinidad
stories.summary: Dwayne Bravo, West Indies' man of the match in the opening ODI, said that the exciting manner of the win should not be allowed to mask the side's errors

stories.title: West Indies v Sri Lanka, 1st ODI, Trinidad

stories.summary: Match home for the first ODI between West Indies and Sri Lanka

stories.title: Going, going ... gone
stories.subTitle: Clinching it with a six
stories.summary: Following Shivnarine Chanderpaul's heroics, Cricinfo looks back at similar one-day thrillers

stories.title: Chanderpaul clinches final-ball thriller
stories.subTitle: West Indies v Sri Lanka, 1st ODI, Trinidad
stories.summary: Shivnarine Chanderpaul carried West Indies to a thrilling final-ball one-wicket thriller in the first one-day international at Port of Spain after being left needing 10 off two deliveries

stories.title: Sri Lanka press faith in youth
stories.subTitle: West Indies v Sri Lanka, 1st ODI, Port of Spain
stories.summary: West Indies' comeback at the Queens Park Oval to square the Test series 1-1 has setup the three-match one-day series perfectly
